profile.name: Anuj Joshi
profile.title: Full Stack Developer
profile.summary: Passionate developer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Focused on creating beautiful, user-centric experiences.

description: Designed, developed, and maintained enterprise-scale frontend applications using React and modern JavaScript standards.
Led and contributed to cloud modernization initiatives, including Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) infrastructure creation and OpenShift (OCP 4) migration.
Established and maintained CI/CD standards using GitHub Actions, enabling one-touch and scheduled workflows across approximately 40 microservices.
Strengthened platform observability and reliability by integrating New Relic monitoring and performance tracking.
Improved security posture by integrating Prisma vulnerability scanning into CI/CD pipelines, reducing platform risk.
Collaborated with cross-functional product, platform, and engineering teams while driving architectural decisions, code quality, and operational excellence.
Implemented CI/CD automation pipelines using CircleCI, Docker, Kubernetes, and Google Cloud Platform.
Developed and maintained full-stack web applications using React, Redux, Django, and GraphQL.
Built Slack bots and automation services using Firebase, Google Cloud Functions, and webhook integrations.
Designed and deployed serverless solutions, managed logging, and supported SEO optimization.
Delivered data analytics and visualization solutions using BigQuery and Google Data Studio.
Led analysis, design, development, deployment, and maintenance of software solutions.
Wrote high-quality, modular, and reusable code following TDD principles and industry best practices.
Actively participated in code reviews, technical discussions, and knowledge sharing.
Evaluated and adopted new technologies to improve development efficiency and product quality.
Developed full-stack web applications using Ruby on Rails and modern frontend technologies.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs and deployment scripts.
Deployed applications to Heroku, Engine Yard, and AWS EC2 environments.
Adhered to organizational coding standards, development processes, and best practices.
Communicated effectively with team members and clients on progress and technical issues.
Completed structured training in HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript under senior mentorship.
Applied pixel-perfect implementation techniques and W3C web standards.
Developed JavaScript-based mini-projects including interactive UI components and games.

projects.title: OnTarget Technology
projects.description: A construction project management platform that visualizes tasks through 3D models using the Autodesk API, delivering an augmented reality–like experience. Enabled teams to manage construction workflows more effectively by integrating spatial visualization with task tracking.

projects.title: Solarwisely
projects.description: A full-stack web application that helps homeowners and small businesses determine optimal solar panel sizing based on roof structure and orientation. Implemented core algorithms, interactive UI, and scalable backend services to process and analyze data efficiently.

projects.title: Vyaguta – ERP System
projects.description: An open-source ERP system designed to manage internal organizational resources and operations. Built a scalable frontend using React and Redux architecture and integrated it with a Java EE backend to support complex enterprise workflows.

universityProjects.title: Data Analytics of Irregular Sensor data
universityProjects.description: Application of a decision tree classifier data in frequency domain, extracting features from data to classify and predict the data-set

universityProjects.title: Convolution Neural Network Analysis
universityProjects.description: Using Pyqt for camera interface and count the number of fingers displayed using CNN with help of tensor flow
